item.title: New Container: Kometa
item.description: We have released a new container for Kometa! Kometa is a powerful tool designed to give you complete control over your media libraries. With Kometa, you can take your customization to the next level, with granular control over metadata, collections, overlays, and much more.

item.title: Plex Meta Manager Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to the upstream project rebranding, we have decided to deprecate our Plex Meta Manager container. Please migrate to our new Kometa image instead.

item.title: New Container: Plex Meta Manager
item.description: We have released a new container for Plex Meta Manager! Plex Meta Manager is a Python 3 script that can be continuously run using YAML configuration files to update on a schedule the metadata of the movies, shows, and collections in your libraries as well as automatically build collections based on various methods all detailed in the wiki.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Plex Meta Manager!

Plex Meta Manager is a Python 3 script that can be continuously run using YAML configuration files to update on a schedule the metadata of the movies, shows, and collections in your libraries as well as automatically build collections based on various methods all detailed in the wiki.
